snippet: Military contractors from Austria, Australia, Israel, the United States and other countries showcased unmanned aerial vehicles throughout the week at the Singapore Airshow.
abstract: Military contractors from Austria, Australia, Israel, United States and other countries showcase unmanned aerial vehicles, or drones, throughout week at Singapore Airshow; contractors are hoping to make deals with militaries across Asia-Pacific region; drones themselves can cost several hundred thousand dollars, with high-end systems costing as much as $20 million.
lead_paragraph: Military contractors from Austria, Australia, Israel, the United States and other countries showcased unmanned aerial vehicles throughout the week at the Singapore Airshow.

headline.main: At Asia Air Show, Plenty of Competition for Sales of Drones
headline.print_headline: At Asia Air Show, Plenty of Competition for Sales of Drones
